name: FBI Pistol Qualification
notes: All draws from concealment unless otherwise noted. Ready position has firearm pointed at 45-degree angle to the ground in front of the target, safety engaged if applicable, finger off trigger.

stages.notes: Fire 3 strong hand, switch hands, fire 3 weak hand.
Draw and fire 3 shots in 3 seconds.
From the low ready position, aim and fire 3 shots in 2 seconds.
From the low ready position, aim and fire 6 shots in 4 seconds.
Draw and fire 5 shots in 5 seconds.
Fire 4 shots, reload, fire 4 more shots.
From the low ready, aim and fire 5 shots in 4 seconds.
Draw and fire 3 shots in 6 seconds.
From the low ready, aim and fire 3 shots in 5 seconds.
Fire 4 shots, drop to kneeling, fire 4 more shots.
